availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas C. Wallace (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Killed by Robert Alexander Burke in 1863.)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Juretta Hawkins Wallace in Franklin County, Kentucky, on April 5, 1831. Father of James Wallace, Reuben Wallace, Sarah Wallace Burke, and Nancy Wallace. Farmer and mechanic in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Killed by Robert Alexander Burke in Franklin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 74B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 350.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Franklin County Marriages, Film 000266192.
